title: CLAY CITY BOARD MEETS
summary: Village trustees approve a 5% pay increase and set an eight-hour workday for all employees amidst heated discussions.
full_story:
1/7/25
By Beth Fancher
Clay City village trustees met last night, dealing with a continuing employee benefits matter that has been under discussion for several months. Board members expressed concern regarding the disparity in benefits provided to office personnel compared to other village employees. Village trustees unanimously voted for all village employees to receive a five percent pay increase...
